title: De Ligt Set For Bayern
description:
The FC crew react to Robert Lewandowski joining Barcelona and question if the team needs another attacker in the squad. Plus, with Lewandowski gone, it looks like Matthijs De Ligt is close to joining Bayern and Luis Garcia debates with Steve Nicol about Eden Hazard's role at Real Madrid.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Lewandowski Leaves Bayern: De Ligt looks to join the Bavarian giants; Hazard's new role with Real Madrid
